text: Soni chisimu chene twatumisye ku nkutula uliose Ntenga (juŵausalilaga) kuti: “Mun’galagatilani Allah ni kuŵambalana najo shetani.” Basi ŵane mwa ŵanganyao pana ŵaŵajongwele Allah, ni pana ŵane mwa ŵanganyao ŵakwasimichiche pa ŵanganyao kusokonechela. Basi jendagani pa chilambo kupita nchilola mujaŵelele mbesi ja akukanila
